subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Tony Pike passed for 362 yards and 3 touchdowns to lead the Cincinnati Bearcats to a 47-15 win in the first game at Rutgers since its stadium expansion.
snippet: Tony Pike passed for 362 yards and 3 touchdowns to lead the Cincinnati Bearcats to a 47-15 win in the first game at Rutgers since its stadium expansion.
